column3: News;Kampot: A German man died in a guest room at Sleeping Dragon in Sovan Sa Kor Village
column5: Kampot City.------Authorities have confirmed as a result of a suicide.Â The incident occurred around noon on Dec. 30
column6: 2018.------Police in Kampot province said that the man  JOHANNES SAUERLAND    was a 68-year-old German national.------CNE reported his wife
column7: ------RUZENA SAUERLANDOVA------ had killed herself in Kampot on Decemer 14th.------Authorities in collaboration with a medical team of Kampot Provincial Referral Hospital found that the German man had taken an overdose of sleeping pills.------ Source
